## About

This project aims to gather, curate, summarize, and publish data about visual acuity as measured by the Teller Acuity Card (TAC) procedure and described in the published literature.
The project will summarize data based on participants grouped by age, sex/gender, or other characteristics.
The project will also summarize individual participant data where available.
